scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Ay, my good lord, and she accepts of it.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: If in her marriage my consent be missing,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: I call the gods to witness, I will choose
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Mine heir from forth the beggars of the world,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: And dispossess her all.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: How shall she be endow'd,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: if she be mated with an equal husband?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Three talents on the present; in future, all.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: This gentleman of mine hath served me long:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: To build his fortune I will strain a little,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: For 'tis a bond in men. Give him thy daughter:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: What you bestow, in him I'll counterpoise,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: And make him weigh with her.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Most noble lord,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Pawn me to this your honour, she is his.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: My hand to thee; mine honour on my promise.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Humbly I thank your lordship: never may
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: The state or fortune fall into my keeping,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Which is not owed to you!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Vouchsafe my labour, and long live your lordship!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: I thank you; you shall hear from me anon:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Go not away. What have you there, my friend?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: A piece of painting, which I do beseech
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Your lordship to accept.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Painting is welcome.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: The painting is almost the natural man;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: or since dishonour traffics with man's nature,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: He is but outside: these pencill'd figures are
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Even such as they give out. I like your work;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: And you shall find I like it: wait attendance
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Till you hear further from me.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: The gods preserve ye!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Well fare you, gentleman: give me your hand;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: We must needs dine together. Sir, your jewel
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Hath suffer'd under praise.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: What, my lord! dispraise?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: A more satiety of commendations.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: If I should pay you for't as 'tis extoll'd,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: It would unclew me quite.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: My lord, 'tis rated
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: As those which sell would give: but you well know,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Things of like value differing in the owners
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Are prized by their masters: believe't, dear lord,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: You mend the jewel by the wearing it.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Well mock'd.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: No, my good lord; he speaks the common tongue,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Which all men speak with him.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Look, who comes here: will you be chid?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: We'll bear, with your lordship.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: He'll spare none.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Good morrow to thee, gentle Apemantus!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Till I be gentle, stay thou for thy good morrow;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: When thou art Timon's dog, and these knaves honest.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Why dost thou call them knaves? thou know'st them not.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Are they not Athenians?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Yes.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Then I repent not.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: You know me, Apemantus?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Thou know'st I do: I call'd thee by thy name.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Thou art proud, Apemantus.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Of nothing so much as that I am not like Timon.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Whither art going?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: To knock out an honest Athenian's brains.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: That's a deed thou'lt die for.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Right, if doing nothing be death by the law.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: How likest thou this picture, Apemantus?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: The best, for the innocence.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Wrought he not well that painted it?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: He wrought better that made the painter; and yet
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: he's but a filthy piece of work.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: You're a dog.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Thy mother's of my generation: what's she, if I be a dog?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Wilt dine with me, Apemantus?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: No; I eat not lords.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: An thou shouldst, thou 'ldst anger ladies.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: O, they eat lords; so they come by great bellies.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: That's a lascivious apprehension.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: So thou apprehendest it: take it for thy labour.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: How dost thou like this jewel, Apemantus?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Not so well as plain-dealing, which will not cost a
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: man a doit.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: What dost thou think 'tis worth?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Not worth my thinking. How now, poet!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: How now, philosopher!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Thou liest.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Art not one?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Yes.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Then I lie not.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Art not a poet?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Yes.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Then thou liest: look in thy last work, where thou
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: hast feigned him a worthy fellow.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: That's not feigned; he is so.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Yes, he is worthy of thee, and to pay thee for thy
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: labour: he that loves to be flattered is worthy o'
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: the flatterer. Heavens, that I were a lord!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: What wouldst do then, Apemantus?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: E'en as Apemantus does now; hate a lord with my heart.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: What, thyself?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Ay.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Wherefore?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: That I had no angry wit to be a lord.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Art not thou a merchant?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Ay, Apemantus.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Traffic confound thee, if the gods will not!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: If traffic do it, the gods do it.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Traffic's thy god; and thy god confound thee!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: What trumpet's that?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: 'Tis Alcibiades, and some twenty horse,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: All of companionship.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Pray, entertain them; give them guide to us.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: You must needs dine with me: go not you hence
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Till I have thank'd you: when dinner's done,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Show me this piece. I am joyful of your sights.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Most welcome, sir!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: So, so, there!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Aches contract and starve your supple joints!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: That there should be small love 'mongst these
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: sweet knaves,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: And all this courtesy! The strain of man's bred out
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Into baboon and monkey.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Sir, you have saved my longing, and I feed
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Most hungerly on your sight.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Right welcome, sir!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Ere we depart, we'll share a bounteous time
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: In different pleasures. Pray you, let us in.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: What time o' day is't, Apemantus?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Time to be honest.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: That time serves still.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: The more accursed thou, that still omitt'st it.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Thou art going to Lord Timon's feast?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Ay, to see meat fill knaves and wine heat fools.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Fare thee well, fare thee well.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Thou art a fool to bid me farewell twice.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Why, Apemantus?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Shouldst have kept one to thyself, for I mean to
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: give thee none.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Hang thyself!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: No, I will do nothing at thy bidding: make thy
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: requests to thy friend.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Away, unpeaceable dog, or I'll spurn thee hence!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: I will fly, like a dog, the heels o' the ass.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: He's opposite to humanity. Come, shall we in,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: And taste Lord Timon's bounty? he outgoes
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: The very heart of kindness.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: He pours it out; Plutus, the god of gold,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Is but his steward: no meed, but he repays
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Sevenfold above itself; no gift to him,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: But breeds the giver a return exceeding
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: All use of quittance.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: The noblest mind he carries
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: That ever govern'd man.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Long may he live in fortunes! Shall we in?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: I'll keep you company.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  Athens. A hall in Timon's house.

line_text: Most honour'd Timon,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: It hath pleased the gods to remember my father's age,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: And call him to long peace.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: He is gone happy, and has left me rich:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Then, as in grateful virtue I am bound
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: To your free heart, I do return those talents,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Doubled with thanks and service, from whose help
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: I derived liberty.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens

line_text: O, by no means,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Honest Ventidius; you mistake my love:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: I gave it freely ever; and there's none
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Can truly say he gives, if he receives:

line_text: If our betters play at that game, we must not dare

scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: To imitate them; faults that are rich are fair.

scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: A noble spirit!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Nay, my lords,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Ceremony was but devised at first
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: To set a gloss on faint deeds, hollow welcomes,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Recanting goodness, sorry ere 'tis shown;

scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: But where there is true friendship, there needs none.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Pray, sit; more welcome are ye to my fortunes
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens

line_text: Than my fortunes to me.

line_text: My lord, we always have confess'd it.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Ho, ho, confess'd it! hang'd it, have you not?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: O, Apemantus, you are welcome.

line_text: No;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: You shall not make me welcome:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: I come to have thee thrust me out of doors.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Fie, thou'rt a churl; ye've got a humour there
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Does not become a man: 'tis much to blame.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: They say, my lords, 'ira furor brevis est;' but yond
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: man is ever angry. Go, let him have a table by

line_text: himself, for he does neither affect company, nor is

line_text: he fit for't, indeed.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Let me stay at thine apperil, Timon: I come to
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens

line_text: observe; I give thee warning on't.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: I take no heed of thee; thou'rt an Athenian,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: therefore welcome: I myself would have no power;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens

line_text: prithee, let my meat make thee silent.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens

line_text: I scorn thy meat; 'twould choke me, for I should
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: ne'er flatter thee. O you gods, what a number of

line_text: men eat Timon, and he sees 'em not! It grieves me

line_text: to see so many dip their meat in one man's blood;

line_text: and all the madness is, he cheers them up too.

line_text: I wonder men dare trust themselves with men:

line_text: Methinks they should invite them without knives;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens

line_text: Good for their meat, and safer for their lives.

scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: There's much example for't; the fellow that sits
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens

line_text: next him now, parts bread with him, pledges the
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens

line_text: breath of him in a divided draught, is the readiest

line_text: man to kill him: 't has been proved. If I were a
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens

line_text: huge man, I should fear to drink at meals;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Lest they should spy my windpipe's dangerous notes:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Great men should drink with harness on their throats.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: My lord, in heart; and let the health go round.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Let it flow this way, my good lord.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Flow this way! A brave fellow! he keeps his tides
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: well. Those healths will make thee and thy state
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens

line_text: look ill, Timon. Here's that which is too weak to
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: be a sinner, honest water, which ne'er left man i' the mire:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: This and my food are equals; there's no odds:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Feasts are too proud to give thanks to the gods.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Apemantus' grace.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Immortal gods, I crave no pelf;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: I pray for no man but myself:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Grant I may never prove so fond,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: To trust man on his oath or bond;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Or a harlot, for her weeping;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Or a dog, that seems a-sleeping:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Or a keeper with my freedom;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Or my friends, if I should need 'em.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Amen. So fall to't:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Rich men sin, and I eat root.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Much good dich thy good heart, Apemantus!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Captain Alcibiades, your heart's in the field now.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: My heart is ever at your service, my lord.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: You had rather be at a breakfast of enemies than a
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: dinner of friends.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: So the were bleeding-new, my lord, there's no meat
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: like 'em: I could wish my best friend at such a feast.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Would all those fatterers were thine enemies then,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: that then thou mightst kill 'em and bid me to 'em!

line_text: Might we but have that happiness, my lord, that you

line_text: from you: how had you been my friends else? why

line_text: have you that charitable title from thousands, did

line_text: not you chiefly belong to my heart? I have told

line_text: more of you to myself than you can with modesty

line_text: speak in your own behalf; and thus far I confirm

line_text: you. O you gods, think I, what need we have any

line_text: were the most needless creatures living, should we

line_text: ne'er have use for 'em, and would most resemble

line_text: sweet instruments hung up in cases that keep their

line_text: sounds to themselves. Why, I have often wished

line_text: myself poorer, that I might come nearer to you. We

line_text: properer can we can our own than the riches of our

line_text: friends? O, what a precious comfort 'tis, to have

line_text: so many, like brothers, commanding one another's

line_text: forget their faults, I drink to you.

line_text: Thou weepest to make them drink, Timon.

scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Joy had the like conception in our eyes

line_text: And at that instant like a babe sprung up.

scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Ho, ho! I laugh to think that babe a bastard.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: I promise you, my lord, you moved me much.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Much!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: What means that trump?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: How now?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Please you, my lord, there are certain
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: ladies most desirous of admittance.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Ladies! what are their wills?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: There comes with them a forerunner, my lord, which
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: bears that office, to signify their pleasures.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: I pray, let them be admitted.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Hail to thee, worthy Timon, and to all
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: That of his bounties taste! The five best senses
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Acknowledge thee their patron; and come freely
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: To gratulate thy plenteous bosom: th' ear,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Taste, touch and smell, pleased from thy tale rise;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: They only now come but to feast thine eyes.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: They're welcome all; let 'em have kind admittance:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Music, make their welcome!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: You see, my lord, how ample you're beloved.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Hoy-day, what a sweep of vanity comes this way!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: They dance! they are mad women.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Like madness is the glory of this life.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: As this pomp shows to a little oil and root.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: We make ourselves fools, to disport ourselves;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: And spend our flatteries, to drink those men
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Upon whose age we void it up again,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: With poisonous spite and envy.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Who lives that's not depraved or depraves?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Who dies, that bears not one spurn to their graves
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Of their friends' gift?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: I should fear those that dance before me now
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Would one day stamp upon me: 't has been done;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Men shut their doors against a setting sun.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: You have done our pleasures much grace, fair ladies,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Set a fair fashion on our entertainment,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: Which was not half so beautiful and kind;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: You have added worth unto 't and lustre,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: And entertain'd me with mine own device;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: I am to thank you for 't.

line_text: Our horses!

line_text: O my friends,

line_text: I have one word to say to you: look you, my good lord,

line_text: As to advance this jewel; accept it and wear it,

line_text: Kind my lord.

line_text: I am so far already in your gifts,--

line_text: So are we all.

scene_title: SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.

line_text: My lord, there are certain nobles of the senate

line_text: Newly alighted, and come to visit you.

line_text: They are fairly welcome.

line_text: I beseech your honour,

line_text: Vouchsafe me a word; it does concern you near.

line_text: Near! why then, another time I'll hear thee:

line_text: I shall accept them fairly; let the presents

line_text: Be worthily entertain'd.

line_text: How now! what news?

line_text: Please you, my lord, that honourable

line_text: gentleman, Lord Lucullus, entreats your company

line_text: Nor will he know his purse, or yield me this,

line_text: To show him what a beggar his heart is,

line_text: Being of no power to make his wishes good:

line_text: His promises fly so beyond his state

line_text: That what he speaks is all in debt; he owes

line_text: For every word: he is so kind that he now

line_text: Pays interest for 't; his land's put to their books.

line_text: Well, would I were gently put out of office

line_text: Before I were forced out!

line_text: Happier is he that has no friend to feed

line_text: Than such that do e'en enemies exceed.

line_text: I bleed inwardly for my lord.

line_text: You do yourselves

line_text: Much wrong, you bate too much of your own merits:

line_text: All to you. Lights, more lights!

line_text: The best of happiness,

line_text: That are given for 'em. Friendship's full of dregs:

play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens

line_text: To counsel deaf, but not to flattery!

line_text: Importune him for my moneys; be not ceased

line_text: With slight denial, nor then silenced when--

scene_title: SCENE I.  A Senator's house.

line_text: 'Commend me to your master'--and the cap

line_text: Plays in the right hand, thus: but tell him,

scene_title: SCENE I.  A Senator's house.

line_text: Out of mine own; his days and times are past

line_text: And my reliances on his fracted dates

line_text: Have smit my credit: I love and honour him,

play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens

line_text: Whose thankless natures--O abhorred spirits!--
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Not all the whips of heaven are large enough:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: What! to you,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Whose star-like nobleness gave life and influence
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: To their whole being! I am rapt and cannot cover
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: The monstrous bulk of this ingratitude
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: With any size of words.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Let it go naked, men may see't the better:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: You that are honest, by being what you are,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Make them best seen and known.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: He and myself
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Have travail'd in the great shower of your gifts,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: And sweetly felt it.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Ay, you are honest men.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: We are hither come to offer you our service.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Most honest men! Why, how shall I requite you?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Can you eat roots, and drink cold water? no.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: What we can do, we'll do, to do you service.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Ye're honest men: ye've heard that I have gold;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: I am sure you have: speak truth; ye're honest men.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: So it is said, my noble lord; but therefore
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Came not my friend nor I.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Good honest men! Thou draw'st a counterfeit
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Best in all Athens: thou'rt, indeed, the best;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Thou counterfeit'st most lively.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: So, so, my lord.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: E'en so, sir, as I say. And, for thy fiction,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Why, thy verse swells with stuff so fine and smooth
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: That thou art even natural in thine art.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: But, for all this, my honest-natured friends,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: I must needs say you have a little fault:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Marry, 'tis not monstrous in you, neither wish I
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: You take much pains to mend.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Beseech your honour
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: To make it known to us.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: You'll take it ill.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Most thankfully, my lord.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Will you, indeed?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Doubt it not, worthy lord.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: There's never a one of you but trusts a knave,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: That mightily deceives you.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Do we, my lord?
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Ay, and you hear him cog, see him dissemble,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Know his gross patchery, love him, feed him,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Keep in your bosom: yet remain assured
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: That he's a made-up villain.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: I know none such, my lord.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Nor I.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Look you, I love you well; I'll give you gold,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Rid me these villains from your companies:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Hang them or stab them, drown them in a draught,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Confound them by some course, and come to me,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: I'll give you gold enough.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Name them, my lord, let's know them.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: You that way and you this, but two in company;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Each man apart, all single and alone,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Yet an arch-villain keeps him company.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: If where thou art two villains shall not be,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Come not near him. If thou wouldst not reside
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: But where one villain is, then him abandon.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Hence, pack! there's gold; you came for gold, ye slaves:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: You have work'd for me; there's payment for you: hence!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: You are an alchemist; make gold of that.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Out, rascal dogs!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: It is in vain that you would speak with Timon;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: For he is set so only to himself
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: That nothing but himself which looks like man
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Is friendly with him.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Bring us to his cave:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: It is our part and promise to the Athenians
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: To speak with Timon.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: At all times alike
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Men are not still the same: 'twas time and griefs
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: That framed him thus: time, with his fairer hand,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Offering the fortunes of his former days,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: The former man may make him. Bring us to him,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: And chance it as it may.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Here is his cave.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Peace and content be here! Lord Timon! Timon!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Look out, and speak to friends: the Athenians,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: By two of their most reverend senate, greet thee:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Speak to them, noble Timon.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Thou sun, that comfort'st, burn! Speak, and
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: be hang'd:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: For each true word, a blister! and each false
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Be as cauterizing to the root o' the tongue,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Consuming it with speaking!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Worthy Timon,--
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Of none but such as you, and you of Timon.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: The senators of Athens greet thee, Timon.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: I thank them; and would send them back the plague,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Could I but catch it for them.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: O, forget
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: What we are sorry for ourselves in thee.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: The senators with one consent of love
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Entreat thee back to Athens; who have thought
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: On special dignities, which vacant lie
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: For thy best use and wearing.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: They confess
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Toward thee forgetfulness too general, gross:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Which now the public body, which doth seldom
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Play the recanter, feeling in itself
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: A lack of Timon's aid, hath sense withal
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Of its own fail, restraining aid to Timon;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: And send forth us, to make their sorrow'd render,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Together with a recompense more fruitful
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Than their offence can weigh down by the dram;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Ay, even such heaps and sums of love and wealth
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: As shall to thee blot out what wrongs were theirs
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: And write in thee the figures of their love,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Ever to read them thine.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: You witch me in it;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Surprise me to the very brink of tears:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Lend me a fool's heart and a woman's eyes,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: And I'll beweep these comforts, worthy senators.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Therefore, so please thee to return with us
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: And of our Athens, thine and ours, to take
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: The captainship, thou shalt be met with thanks,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Allow'd with absolute power and thy good name
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Live with authority: so soon we shall drive back
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Of Alcibiades the approaches wild,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Who, like a boar too savage, doth root up
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: His country's peace.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: And shakes his threatening sword
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Against the walls of Athens.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Therefore, Timon,--
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Well, sir, I will; therefore, I will, sir; thus:
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: If Alcibiades kill my countrymen,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Let Alcibiades know this of Timon,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: That Timon cares not. But if be sack fair Athens,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: And take our goodly aged men by the beards,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Giving our holy virgins to the stain
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Of contumelious, beastly, mad-brain'd war,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Then let him know, and tell him Timon speaks it,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: In pity of our aged and our youth,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: I cannot choose but tell him, that I care not,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: And let him take't at worst; for their knives care not,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: While you have throats to answer: for myself,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: There's not a whittle in the unruly camp
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: But I do prize it at my love before
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: The reverend'st throat in Athens. So I leave you
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: To the protection of the prosperous gods,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: As thieves to keepers.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Stay not, all's in vain.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Why, I was writing of my epitaph;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: it will be seen to-morrow: my long sickness
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Of health and living now begins to mend,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: And nothing brings me all things. Go, live still;
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Be Alcibiades your plague, you his,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: And last so long enough!
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: We speak in vain.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: But yet I love my country, and am not
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: One that rejoices in the common wreck,
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: As common bruit doth put it.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: That's well spoke.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Commend me to my loving countrymen,--
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: These words become your lips as they pass
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: thorough them.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: And enter in our ears like great triumphers
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: In their applauding gates.
play_title_long: The Life of Timon of Athens
scene_title: SCENE I.  The woods. Before Timon's cave.

line_text: Commend me to them,
